member.name: M:JetBrains.Platform.RdFramework.ExternalProcessModel.ProtocolModelExternalProcess`1.CreateModel(JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime,JetBrains.Platform.RdFramework.IProtocol,System.Action{`0})
member.summary:
Create your model here. Don't forget to advise on your own Initialized property of your model and call from it. If callback was not called in specified timeout so method will throw an exception
DON'T USE RdSignal for this purpose because it isn't fired on initial value!!!
member.param: callback that must be called after your model counter part is initialized

member.summary: Stub ctor for local use by Shell container.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.RdFramework.Impl.SimpleInpaceExecutingScheduler
member.summary: Executes the given action just in the current thread in Queue method
